article: High school seems bigger. There are _ kids and it's a totally new environment. It could be a _ time for new students, _ ,in fact, it isn't really that bad. The first day of course is always terrifying, but, then again, the first day of middle school was probably the _ .Of course you might get lost during the first few days looking for your classes, but after a while what seems like a large school really isn't. One thing that's really cool about high school is that there are so many more classes that you can _ .For example, if you like _ ,there are many art classes. At the same time, there are other classes, which you can't take in middle school _ photography and psychology .There are many new things in high school that make it much more _ . In high school, you're able to join more clubs, play more sports, and take part in more _ ,and at the same time make new friends with kids with the same _ as you. Also, these activities can give you a _ to learn something that you might not have had the opportunity to learn in middle school . High school is different _ everyone, but there's one thing that's _ .You're going to have just as much fun here as you _ before. But having fun isn't enough though! You're growing up so you have to be more responsible. Everything changes when you get _ ,but the changes aren't that bad. You _ worry too much about growing up.
